data.question: What is the role of ultrasound in the synthesis of coordination polymer nanofibers?
data.answer: Ultrasound changes the morphology of the material from sheetlike microparticles into nanofibers, resulting in the immobilization of organic solvents.

data.question: What is the chemical formula of the coordination polymer discussed in the text?
What is the critical gel concentration of {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n in acetonitrile?
How long does it take for colorless block crystals of {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2·(DMSO)x·(dioxane)y·(H2O)z}n to be obtained?
What is the effect of sonication on the phase transition temperature (Tgel) of the gel in methanol?
data.answer: The Tgel of the gel in methanol exceeds the boiling point of methanol.

data.question: Can the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n gelate water?
data.answer: No, it forms a precipitate in water.

data.question: Is the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n soluble in DMSO?
data.answer: Yes, it forms a solution in DMSO.

data.question: Does sonication decrease the size of the coordination polymer particles?
data.answer: True, sonication changes the morphology from microparticles to nanofibers.

data.question: Is the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n considered a supergelator in acetonitrile?
data.answer: True, as it can immobilize a large amount of solvent.

data.question: Does the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n require auxiliary moieties for gel formation?
data.answer: False, it facilitates the formation of gels without auxiliary moieties.

data.question: What is the role of CF3SO3- anions in the structure of {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n?
data.answer: They act as counteranions and do not participate in the coordination.

data.question: What is the estimated length of the rigid bibp ligand?
Are the coordination polymer gels formed by {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n thermally stable?
data.answer: True, the Tgel exceeds the boiling points of the solvents used.

data.question: Does the coordination mode of zinc(II) change after sonication?
data.answer: True, from tetrahedron to seesaw coordination geometry.

data.question: What is the effect of sonication on the coordination environment of metal ions in the coordination polymer?
data.answer: Sonication facilitates a break−reorganization of coordination bonds, leading to a morphological transition.

data.question: Can the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n gelate ethanol?
data.answer: True, it forms a stable gel in ethanol upon sonication.

data.question: Is the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n soluble in water?
data.answer: False, it forms a precipitate in water.

data.question: What is the yield of the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n when synthesized?
What is the role of methanol in the synthesis of coordination polymer particles {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n?
data.answer: Methanol is used as a solvent for the reaction between Zn(OSO2CF3)2 and bibp.

data.question: Does the coordination polymer {Zn(bibp)2(OSO2CF3)2}n require high temperatures for gelation?
data.answer: False, gelation is induced by sonication at room temperature.
